rukus.text: And they ask you about the Spirit (Ruh), say, “The Spirit (comes) with the command of my Lord$, and you have been given little knowledge,”(therefore you cannot understand everything). $ Or, the Sprit is from one of the affairs of my Lord
And if We will We can definitely take away that which We have communicated to you, then you would not find for it any trustee (in whom you could put your trust) against Us
but (this has not been done because of ) the mercy from your Lord. His grace on you is certainly great

Say, “If mankind and jinn were to gather together on (the project of) bringing (out) a Quran similar to this, they would not be able to bring (out anything) similar to it, even if they help each other.”
And in this Quran, We have repeated for mankind every kind of similitude, but the majority of mankind refuses (to understand, and accept nothing) but disbelief
And they say, “We will never believe in you till you cause a spring to gush forth from the earth for us
Or you have a garden of date palms and grapes and cause gushing out rivers to gush forth in spaces between the (trees of the garden)
Or you cause the sky to fall upon us in pieces as you claim, or you bring God and the angels face to face (with us)

Or you have a house of gold or you climb into the sky, and we will not believe in your climbing till you bring down to us a book which we could read.” Say, “Glory be to my Lord! am I anything but a human (news giving) messenger?”
